phylogenyCitation.title: Evolution of a charismatic neotropical clade: Molecular phylogeny of Tabebuia s. l., Crescentieae, and allied genera (Bignoniaceae).

phylorefs.label: Bignoniaceae
phylorefs.dwc:scientificNameAuthorship: Olmstead, R. G., Lohmann, L. G.
phylorefs.cladeDefinition: The least inclusive clade containing Bignonia capreolata Linnaeus 1753, Jacaranda mimosifolia D. Don 1822, and Eccremocarpus scaber Ruiz & Pavon 1794.

hasName.label: Eccremocarpus scaber Ruiz Lopez and Pavon, 1794
